GlobalEnabled.Name: Enable Error Reporting
GlobalEnabled.Hint: Send anonymous error reports to help module authors fix bugs. You can change this at any time.

PrivacyLevel.Name: Privacy Level
PrivacyLevel.Hint: Control how much information is included in error reports

Choices.detailed: Detailed - Standard + browser info + scene context

EndpointConfig.Name: Configure Error Endpoints
EndpointConfig.Label: Configure Endpoints
EndpointConfig.Hint: Set up error reporting endpoints for different module authors
EndpointConfig.Title: Configure Error Reporting Endpoints
EndpointConfig.Description: Configure where error reports are sent for different module authors. You can add multiple endpoints and control which modules report to which authors.
EndpointConfig.Author: Module Author
EndpointConfig.AuthorHint: All modules by this author will be monitored. Leave blank to use specific modules only.
EndpointConfig.ModulesHint: Comma-separated list of specific module IDs to monitor (optional if author is specified).
EndpointConfig.NoEndpoints: No endpoints configured. Click 'Add Endpoint' to get started.
EndpointConfig.TestNoUrl: Cannot test endpoint: URL is required
EndpointConfig.ConfirmRemoveContent: Are you sure you want to remove the endpoint '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
EndpointConfig.NoRegisteredModules: No modules have registered with the API yet

Welcome.Title: Help improve Foundry modules by reporting errors

ExcludedItems.WorldData: Your world data or character information

PrivacyLevels.Title: Privacy Levels:
PrivacyLevels.Minimal: Only error message and stack trace

Welcome.PrivacyNote: All reports are anonymous and help module authors fix bugs faster. You can change this setting anytime in Module Settings.

MinimalItems.StackTrace: Stack trace (showing where the error occurred)

StandardItems.ModuleList: List of active modules (names and versions only)

DetailedItems.ErrorContext: Error context (filename, line number if available)

NotCollectedItems.WorldData: World data, actors, items, or scenes content

DataUsageItems.HelpAuthors: Help module authors identify and fix bugs
DataUsageItems.NoTracking: NO tracking or profiling of users
DataUsageItems.NoSelling: NO data selling or marketing use

RightsItems.OptOut: You can opt-out at any time
RightsItems.ChangePrivacy: You can change your privacy level anytime
RightsItems.DisableEndpoints: You can disable reporting for specific endpoints
RightsItems.Anonymous: All reports are anonymous by design

Notifications.Enabled: Error reporting enabled. Thank you for helping improve Foundry modules!
